thread.title: Teen Shot in Maryland School Attack Dies

author: Scott Calvert
title: Teen Shot in Maryland School Attack Dies
text:
A 16-year-old girl who was the victim of a school shooting Tuesday in southern Maryland died at a hospital, according to the St. Mary’s County Sheriff’s Office.
The family decided to take the girl, Jaelynn Willey, off life support Thursday evening, said her mother Melissa Willey. Ms. Willey said at a news conference that the girl had been shot in the head and declared brain-dead.
